course_description: NBB encompassess a large and diverse range of research questions, approaches and methods, and so we will explore cutting-edge research at Emory ranging from intracellular molecular studies, to animal behavior manipulations, to clinical studies, to medical humanities and neuroethics.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1697, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: L. Roesch, Status: Closed
